On Wed, 19 Mar 2003, First Last <brianpdoyle@...> wrote:

> So my question is what is the easiest solution to this problem?

There probably is no easy solution.

Not using a separate VM per TestCase class has been an Ant enhancement
request for quite some time now [1], but nobody has found the time to
completely code it up yet.

> or just write a different XML report formatter or something
> completely different.

This may be the easier solution.

Stefan

Footnotes: 
[1]  <http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=10413>
